about_the_game:
The Armed Forces of Ukraine is a game about the Armed Forces of Ukraine.
AFU game offers you to take on a role of a soldier of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and try yourself in a performance of various missions with a plot.
Starting with the banal defense of the base, to the destruction of the legendary orc cruiser.


Features:
• The game has a store where you can buy weapons, bulletproof vests and helmets to use in various missions or free modes.
At the moment, there are ore than 10 types of weapons in the game:
Machine gun,
Shotgun,
Sniper and so on.

There are free modes in the game:
• Bombardment mode - a mode where you can relax and drop an infinite number of missiles on orcs(kacapi), who are trying to reach cities.
For every orc you shoot down, you get hryvnia.
Also there is a shop available in this mode, where you can request help from soldiers who will demolish orcs or buy bullets for turrets that will demolish tanks and armored personnel carriers.

• Base defense mode - you can choose a weapon, a map, adjust strength of enemies and endlessly crush orcs yourself.
In base defense mode, orcs attack you from different sides.
You need to survive a certain number of waves and prevent orcs from destroying the Ukrainian server with important information.
Also in this mode, a shop is available, where you can ask for help from soldiers who will destroy orcs or buy bullets or a first aid kit.

• In each free mode, you can choose the difficulty and turn on/off furious rock music!

AFU game offers you to take on a role of a soldier of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and try yourself in a performance of various missions with a plot.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I5-3470
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 730
  • Additional Notes: Installed Ukrainian wallpaper (optional)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I5-3470
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • Additional Notes: Installed Ukrainian wallpaper (optional)

short_description: AFU game offers you to take on the role of a soldier of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and try yourself in a performance of various missions with a plot. Starting with a banal base defense, to the destruction of the legendary orc`s cruiser.
